addressOf(bytes32).notice: simulating the contract registry. always returns the address of this contract

conversionPath(address,address).notice: returns the conversion path -> always a direct path

convertByPath(address[],uint256,uint256,.notice: calculates the return tokens when swapping _amount, makes sure the return is bigger than _minReturn, mints and burns the test tokens accordingly.

rateByPath(address[],uint256).notice: queries the rate from the Price Feed contract and computes the expected return amount based on the amout of source tokens to be swapped.

nodes.documentation: simulating the contract registry. always returns the address of this contract
nodes.name: addressOf

nodes.documentation:
calculates the return tokens when swapping _amount, makes sure the return is bigger than _minReturn,
mints and burns the test tokens accordingly.
nodes.name: convertByPath

nodes.documentation:
queries the rate from the Price Feed contract and computes the expected return amount based on the
amout of source tokens to be swapped.
nodes.name: rateByPath

nodes.documentation: returns the conversion path -> always a direct path
nodes.name: conversionPath
